bibliographic-data.invention-title: GAMING SYSTEM AND A METHOD OF GAMING

abstract.p: A gaming system is disclosed which is arranged to randomly display a plurality of symbols from a set of symbols. The gaming system comprises a function allocator arranged to allocate a function to at least one symbol selected from the set of symbols, and a game outcome generator arranged to determine a game outcome based on the displayed symbols and on the function allocated to the selected symbol. A corresponding method, computer program and computer readable medium having computer readable program code embodied therein are also disclosed.

abstract.p: Abstract A gaming system (10, 40, 100, 200) is disclosed which is arranged to randomly display a plurality of symbols from a 5 set of symbols (14) . The gaming system comprises a function allocator (26) arranged to allocate a function to at least one symbol selected from the set of symbols (14), and a game outcome generator (28) arranged to determine a game outcome based on the displayed symbols and on the 10 function allocated to the selected symbol. A corresponding method, computer program and computer readable medium having computer readable program code embodied therein are also disclosed. 2547081 (GHMatters) Outcome generator Function Symbol allocator selector 22"1T 20 Function 24 selector 12 Memory Symol Functions Game instruction -- 18 Fig. 1

UN SYSTEME DE PRATIQUE DE JEU ET UNE METHODE DE PRATIQUE DE JEU

abstract.p: A gaming system (10, 40, 100, 200) is disclosed which is arranged to randomly display a plurality of symbols from a set of symbols (14). The gaming system comprises a function allocator (26) arranged to allocate a function to at least one symbol selected from the set of symbols (14), and a game outcome generator (28) arranged to determine a game outcome based on the displayed symbols and on the function allocated to the selected symbol. A corresponding method, computer program and computer readable medium having computer readable program code embodied therein are also disclosed.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: A gaming system and a method of gaming

abstract.p: A gaming system and method of operating a gaming system is provided. The system is arranged to randomly display a number of symbols from a set of symbols and includes: - a function allocator to allocation a function to at least one symbol selected from the set of symbols, and - a game outcome generator arranged to determine a game outcome based on the displayed symbols and on the function allocated, where the symbols include a number of standard symbols with at least one of the standard symbols having a special symbol incorporated into a standard symbol as a background symbol, a superimposed symbol, a double symbol or by alternately displaying the standard symbol and the special symbol, and where the function allocator allocates a function to a standard symbol incorporating the special symbol, when the special symbol is separately displayed.
